sub_title: Sales Support Manager Benelux & Poland at ICU Medical
summary: Intrigued by communication in all its aspects!

publications.name: Welke digitale communicatiemiddelen kunnen bijdragen tot een optimaler wedstrijdverloop in het hedendaags voetbal?

authors.headline: Sales Support Manager Benelux & Poland at ICU Medical

profile_positions.description:
• Providing sales reports to the Director Sales Benelux and Poland, national sales managers, sales representatives pertaining to sales history, YoY sales analysis, installed base, set utilization, 
pricing.
• Collecting, collating information on wins, losses and pipeline information generated from the Commercial team and providing data to the Managing Director and the F,P&A function for the region.
• Supporting the commercial country manager in consolidating commercial data.
• Using commercial driven information to support National Sales Managers drive accuracy of the LE forecasting process throughout the year.
• Communicating supply shortages to the Commercial team; working with Customer Service to offer alternatives for back ordered product codes.
• Supporting the management of E&O pertaining to in-country sales, working with commercial team to minimize exposure and move stock.
• Organizing requests from commercial team and working with, submitting to Regional Regulatory team for any Product registration requirements.
• Supporting Regional Demand Planning team with follow up requests if needed to finalize 
monthly reporting on wins, losses, and pipeline.
• Managing and processing incoming requests from commercial team for literature, samples. 
• Managing data entered into Sales cloud or other tool used to track existing, new business 
implementations, internal communication to ensure appropriate stock levels needed.
• Supporting marketing team as needed related to new product launch process.
• Processing and tracking incoming product complaints from customers. Providing regular 
overviews to the commercial team. 
• Helping with preparation for Conferences and symposium together with marketing 
• Maintaining an overview of End of life Letters/Field Safety notices/Recalls of MDR.
profile_positions.title: Sales Support Manager Benelux & Poland

profile_positions.description:
•	Proactively manage shipment dates, or proposal of alternate items to reduce late deliveries to customers.
•	Coordinate with the shipping companies regarding order status and POD’s, expedite urgent requests
•	Work with Planning relative to backordered or late deliveries to ensure accurate and proactive information to customer as necessary.
•	Process and follow up on tender orders with sales, logistics, manufacturing and customer 
•	Cross train in other areas in order to better support the functions of the supply chain. (e.g. blanket orders management)
profile_positions.title: SCS Key Account Specialist Benelux

profile_positions.description:
- Monitoring Belgian, Dutch and Luxembourgish hospitals and distributors from order until delivery and after-sales.
- Back-up for France and Germany. 
- Responsible for entering and follow-up of orders (Oracle).
- Offering direct solutions in case of supply shortage. 
- Solving issues in dialogue with the local account managers.
profile_positions.title: SCS Specialist Benelux

profile_positions.description:
UTA - the fuel card and service card expert

Being one of the leading companies for more than 50 years within the sector, you can rely on UTA's expert knowledge and service throughout Europe. From refuelling to toll and many additional Plus Services.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

•	Monitoring Belgian and Dutch companies from order until delivery and after-sales.
•	Creation of route maps (service stations) for the convenience of the customers.
•	Online communication (e.g. newsletter)
•	Translations (Dutch-French, English-Dutch)
•	First contact person for Euro Trucking JSC. Euro Trucking is a company that only works for logistics service providers. Located in different countries such as Bulgaria and Romania, the company tries to become a leading service company for the logistics branch.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Sales Support

profile_positions.description:
Neon Elite Group is a manufacturer of illuminated signs and architectural lighting. Over the past 50 years Neon Elite Group has gained a very strong reputation as a supplier of illuminated and non-illuminated advertisements for the identification and signage of façades and buildings in the outdoor advertising industry.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Project: Philip Morris Benelux

Being the first contact person for Philip Morris Benelux, I’m responsible for organizing and monitoring placements/installments, removals and repairs of Philip Morris materials in Belgium and Luxembourg, such as:
• Indoor/outdoor (non-)illuminated signs 
• Furniture (e.g. counter, shelves, cabinet)
• Tailor made interior
etc.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Pre-Text PR & Events has been active for more than 20 years, helping companies and non-profit organizations in their communication, and/or organizing corporate events for them.  
The services include press relations, copy writing, editing, lobbying, business development, promotion, marketing projects, team buildings, product launches, conventions, seminars, B2B-events and incentives.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

•	Follow up press releases
•	Compose press files
•	Design and send out news letters
•	Organization of press conferences (coordination, reception and follow up of journalists)
•	Co-organizer of events (such as ‘Brasschaat Klassiek’)
profile_positions.title: Internship
